info.title: SAHOOL Platform API
info.description: Agricultural Intelligence Platform - منصة الذكاء الزراعي

servers.description: SAHOOL Agro Advisor - Disease diagnosis, nutrient assessment, and fertilizer planning for Yemen agriculture

AI Advisor Service - User question
SAHOOL Alert Service - معرف التنبيه
SAHOOL Astronomical Calendar Service - مفتاح المرحلة
SAHOOL Billing Core | خدمة الفوترة - Complete billing, subscription, and payment management for SAHOOL platform
SAHOOL Crop Health Service - Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
سهول فيجن - Sahool Vision - ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Use crop-intelligence-service instead. خدمة الذكاء الاصطناعي لتشخيص أمراض النباتات | AI-powered Plant Disease Diagnosis
SAHOOL Crop Health Service - Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
SAHOOL Equipment Service - Agricultural equipment and asset management API
SAHOOL Fertilizer Advisor | مستشار السماد - Comprehensive NPK recommendations, soil analysis, and fertilization scheduling
SAHOOL Field Chat - Real-time collaboration for fields, tasks, and incidents
SAHOOL Field Core - Crop profitability analysis and financial insights for farmers
SAHOOL Field Core - Crop profitability analysis and financial insights for farmers
SAHOOL Field Operations - Agricultural field management, operations tracking, and data aggregation
SAHOOL Field Service - SAHOOL Field Service - Main API
SAHOOL GlobalGAP Compliance Service - IFA version | إصدار معايير IFA
SAHOOL Agricultural Indicators | خدمة المؤشرات الزراعية - Comprehensive agricultural indicators dashboard - KPIs, trends, alerts
SAHOOL Inventory Service - Agricultural inventory management, forecasting, and analytics
SAHOOL IoT Gateway - MQTT to NATS bridge for sensor data ingestion
SAHOOL Smart Irrigation Service | خدمة الري الذكي - AI-powered irrigation scheduling, water conservation, and smart recommendations
SAHOOL MCP Server - Model Context Protocol server for SAHOOL agricultural platform
SAHOOL NDVI Engine - Remote sensing NDVI computation and vegetation analysis
SAHOOL NDVI Processor - YYYY-MM-DD
SAHOOL Notification Service | خدمة الإشعارات - Personalized agricultural notifications for Yemeni farmers. Field-First Architecture with NATS integration.
SAHOOL Provider Configuration Service - خدمة إدارة وتكوين المزودين الخارجيين للخرائط والطقس والأقمار الصناعية

SAHOOL Satellite Service | خدمة الأقمار الصناعية - ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Use vegetation-analysis-service instead. Multi-provider satellite monitoring with automatic fallback. Supports Sentinel Hub, Copernicus STAC, NASA Earthdata. Includes Sentinel-1 SAR for soil moisture estimation. Now with GDD (Growing Degree Days) tracking for 40+ Yemen crops.
SAHOOL Task Service - Agricultural task management API

SAHOOL Satellite Service | خدمة الأقمار الصناعية - Multi-provider satellite monitoring with automatic fallback. Supports Sentinel Hub, Copernicus STAC, NASA Earthdata. Includes Sentinel-1 SAR for soil moisture estimation. Now with GDD (Growing Degree Days) tracking for 40+ Yemen crops.
Sahool Virtual Sensors Engine - Maximum temperature (°C)

SAHOOL Advanced Weather Service | خدمة الطقس المتقدمة - ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Use weather-service instead. 7-day forecasting with real weather APIs, agricultural weather alerts, and crop-specific recommendations
SAHOOL Weather Core - Agricultural weather assessment, forecasting, and alerts
SAHOOL Weather Core - Agricultural weather assessment, forecasting, and alerts
SAHOOL WebSocket Gateway - Real-time WebSocket communication hub with room-based messaging
